page.title: 11 Education
page.content:
{ Education
The schools in our block are:- Lanchester Co.Infant School. Lanchester Endowed Parochial School. Lanchester RC Junior and Infant. St Bede's Comprehensive School. Lanchester Nursery and Burnhope. Burnhope Junior Mixed and Infant.
{Burnhope School} At Burnhope School there are about 120 children in the school.We sometimes have P.E in the hall,but if it is fine we play out on the field.We do some Maths every day and we do English every day.There are 4 classes with about 30 people in each class.We have a Book Club every Tuesday and Thursdays.Our ages are 4_11 and then when we are 11years we go to Greencroft Comprehensive School near
